item.title: China New Addition To Global Innovation Index Top 10
item.description: Despite having been quite a stable affair, the 2025 Global Innovation Index saw some significant changes, with China in and Germany out of the ranking...

item.title: ‘Beauty In Black’ Dethroned In Netflix’s Top 10 List By A New Crime Show
item.description: Here's what new show has knocked Beauty in Black off the #1 spot in Netflix's top 10 list.

item.title: ‘Borderlands 4’ Is The Best ‘Borderlands,’ Believe It Or Not
item.description: Borderlands 4 is somehow the best Borderlands game in the history of the series with what's changed and what's stayed the same.

item.title: NASA Finds 6,000th Alien Planet, 30 Years After Its First
item.description: The space agency has confirmed the existence of 6,000 planets orbiting a star other than the sun, with 8,000 more waiting to be confirmed.

item.title: Five Years On, TikTok’s Benadryl Overdose Challenge Endangers Teens
item.description: Five years after the deadly TikTok Benadryl Challenge began, kids are still at risk. Learn what parents can do to protect teens from dangerous trends.
